method.name: i_cal_enum_array_new

parameter.name: increment_size
parameter.comment: how many slots to allocate on array expansion

method.comment: Creates a new #ICalEnumArray.

method.name: i_cal_enumarray_clone

returns.comment: The newly cloned #ICalEnumArray with the same value as the @array

method.comment: Creates a deep copy of #ICalEnumArray with the same properties as the @array.

method.name: i_cal_enumarray_free
method.comment: Frees the #ICalEnumArray.

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_element_append_value
method.comment: Appends an integer value to the @array. See also i_cal_enum_array_element_add_value(), i_cal_enum_array_element_append_x_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_element_append_x_value
method.comment: Appends an X (custom) value to the @array. See also i_cal_enum_array_element_add_x_value(), i_cal_enum_array_element_append_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_element_add_value
method.comment: Adds an integer value to the @array, omitting duplicates. See also i_cal_enum_array_element_append_value(), i_cal_enum_array_element_add_x_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_element_add_x_value
method.comment: Adds an X (custom) value to the @array, omitting duplicates. See also i_cal_enum_array_element_append_x_value(), i_cal_enum_array_element_add_value()

method.name: i_cal_enumarray_remove_element_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: The position in which the element will be removed from the array

method.comment: Removes the element at the @position from the array.

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_element_get_value_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: The position the target element is located

returns.comment: The element integer value located at the @position in the @array

method.comment: Gets the element integer value located in the @position in the @array. Zero if position is out of bounds.

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_element_get_xvalue_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: The position the target element is located

returns.comment: The element X value located at the @position in the @array

method.comment: Gets the element X value located in the @position in the @array. %NULL if position is out of bounds.

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_size
method.comment: Gets the size of the array.

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_find_value

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The integer value to search for

returns.comment: The index of the value in the @array, or an index out of bounds, if not found.

method.comment: Searches for an integer value in the @array. See also i_cal_enum_array_find_x_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_find_x_value

parameter.name: xvalue
parameter.comment: The X (custom) value to search for

returns.comment: The index of the value in the @array, or an index out of bounds, if not found.

method.comment: Searches for an integer value in the @array. See also i_cal_enum_array_find_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_append_value
method.comment: Appends an integer value to the @array. See also i_cal_enum_array_add_value(), i_cal_enum_array_append_x_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_append_x_value
method.comment: Appends an X (custom) value to the @array. See also i_cal_enum_array_add_x_value(), i_cal_enum_array_append_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_add_value
method.comment: Adds an integer value to the @array, omitting duplicates. See also i_cal_enum_array_append_value(), i_cal_enum_array_add_x_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_add_x_value
method.comment: Adds an X (custom) value to the @array, omitting duplicates. See also i_cal_enum_array_append_x_value(), i_cal_enum_array_add_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_remove_element_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: The position in which the element will be removed from the array

method.comment: Removes the element at the @position from the array.

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_remove_value
method.comment: Removes all occurrences of an integer value from the @array. See also i_cal_enum_array_remove_x_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_remove_x_value
method.comment: Removes all occurrences of an X (custom) value from the @array. See also i_cal_enum_array_remove_value()

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_free
method.comment: Frees the #ICalEnumArray.

method.name: i_cal_enum_array_clone

returns.comment: The newly cloned #ICalEnumArray with the same value as the @array

method.comment: Creates a deep copy of #ICalEnumArray with the same properties as the @array.
